question:
Which of the following statements are correct about "Golden langur"?
1. It is a diurnal primate endemic to India and Bhutan in south-east Asia.
2. It was first discovered by E. P. Gee in 1953.Â 
3. Its scientific name is "Trachypithecus geei".
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Golden langur is a diurnal primate endemic to India and Bhutan in south-east Asia which was first discovered by E. P. Gee in 1953. Its scientific name is "Trachypithecus geei". They are highly social.
